title: Kanye West Says New Album Jesus Is King Is Out This Week
text:
Kanye West has a new release date for Jesus Is King. This time, he’s tweeted that it’s out on October 25. He tweeted the news with the below image of the album on vinyl. It’s due the same day that an accompanying documentary film is coming to IMAX theaters.

Jesus Is King was originally announced for a September 27 release by Kim Kardashian West, which was later pushed to September 29. It never arrived. The weekend when it was expected to drop, Kanye held Sunday Service events and hosted listening parties for the album. He’s since held Sunday Service events every week in locations around the world.

Last year, Kanye released ye and, with Kid Cudi, Kids See Ghosts. He has another album, Yandhi, that remains indefinitely postponed. He’s said he plans to release gospel music exclusively from now on.

Read about everything that happened at Kanye’s Jesus Is King event in New York, and revisit “What We Saw at Kanye’s ye Listening Party in Wyoming.”
description: After some false starts, the record officially arrives Friday. (Probably.)
